title: Protest opposite Trincomalee Navy Camp
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A protest is currently underway opposite the Sri Lanka Navy Camp located in Trincomalee.
Locals have converged outside the Navy Camp after information claimed that Ex-Prime Minister Mahinda Rajapaksa and his family has sought refuge at the Navy Camp.
Lawyers want police to immediately arrest Ex-Prime Minister over violence
Fully supportive of democracy, stability and economic recovery – India
